title: lovers bagel
description: Avocado gives this sandwich its creamy richness, and the healthy fats will help to keep you feeling full. Pack as many raw veggies as you can on top. Best made fresh.
ingredients: 1 wholemeal or 50/50 thin bagel, sliced in half
30g/1oz roasted red pepper from a jar (not in oil), drained, sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
